articles.author: COURTNEY WALSH Associated Press
articles.title: Verstappen wins in wild finish to F1 Australian Grand Prix - ABC News
articles.description: Red Bull’s Max Verstappen has claimed his first Australian Grand Prix in remarkable circumstances in a chaotic Formula 1 race filled with drama from the green light to the checkered flag
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia -- Red Bulls Max Verstappen claimed his first Australian Grand Prix on Sunday in remarkable circumstances after a chaotic F1 race filled with drama from the green light to the ch… [+3389 chars]

articles.author: Sky Sports
articles.title: Australian GP: Max Verstappen holds off Lewis Hamilton for victory after wild finish to chaotic race - CNBC
articles.description: Max Verstappen held off Lewis Hamilton to claim a maiden Australian Grand Prix victory after a chaotic race, which finished with a processional safety-car lap following a wild late restart.
articles.content:
Max Verstappen held off Lewis Hamilton to claim a maiden Australian Grand Prix victory after a chaotic race, which finished with a processional safety-car lap following a wild late restart.
